remarks: Negation of a converging sum.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 29-Jun-2017.)
statement:
isumneg.1 $e |- Z = ( ZZ>= ` M ) $.
isumneg.2 $e |- ( ph -> M e. ZZ ) $.
isumneg.3 $e |- ( ph -> sum_ k e. Z A e. CC ) $.
isumneg.4 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> ( F ` k ) = A ) $.
isumneg.5 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> A e. CC ) $.
isumneg.6 $e |- ( ph -> seq M ( + , F ) e. dom ~~> ) $.
isumneg $p |- ( ph -> sum_ k e. Z -u A = -u sum_ k e. Z A ) $.
$d F k $.
$d M k $.
$d Z k $.
$d k ph $.
